text: 1.10 Stt 19.4-5, 1 Ti 6.3, 2 Ti 4.3, Tat 1.9 Binɨb bin si bɨ si gɨpal okok, bɨ penpen chɨb mɨgan gɨpal okok, bɨ kɨli okok nɨb dad apɨl wog gɨñeb kɨli kañ gel gɨpal okok, yepɨs apal okok, tay yepɨs agɨl chɨn nɨŋɨd agobun apal okok, tɨtay gɨlɨg God takaw yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl ak agjuwɨl kelɨgɨpal okok, God takaw ak kɨlop kɨles gɨl agñub.
